item.title: Searching a Git repository using VIM
item.author: jason@jjasonclark.com (Jason Clark)
item.description: Searching Git repositories is very simple using the Fugitive and Unimpaired plug-ins. They allow you to jump to each file and line in the result set with default keybindings.
